thread.title: Stephanie Davis and Jeremy McConnell could bag £50,000 for their own reality show to follow their lives with new baby Caben-Albi
thread.title_full: Stephanie Davis and Jeremy McConnell could bag £50,000 for their own reality show to follow their lives with new baby Caben-Albi

author: bpotter
title: Stephanie Davis and Jeremy McConnell could bag £50,000 for their own reality show to follow their lives with new baby Caben-Albi
text:
TV Magazine A NEW CHAPTER Stephanie Davis and Jeremy McConnell could bag £50,000 for their own reality show to follow their lives with new baby Caben-Albi 
Telly bosses are queuing up to offer them their own series after they were pictured together yesterday Exclusive By Benjy Potter, Bizarre Reporter 21st February 2017, 10:10 am Click to share on Facebook (Opens in new window) Comments STEPHANIE Davis and Jeremy McConnell could be set to hit the jackpot after telly bosses started lining up to offer them their own show. 3 Telly bosses are lining up to offer Steph and Jeremy their own show after the pair were pictured together for the first time since they resolved their paternity row 
A source told The Sun’s Bizarre column: “Steph and Jeremy are the hottest property in the reality TV world at the moment and producers are keen to get them their own show. 
“It would be a ratings winner and the pair could walk away with over £50,000.” 3 Steph and Jeremy first met in Celebrity Big Brother in January 2016 
The former couple had been at war with each other for most of 2016 after Stephanie revealed her unexpected pregnancy news, but it appears the former flames have been able to spend a “lovely” few days together ever since Jeremy’s paternity test confirmed he is the child’s father . 
New mum Stephanie gave her fans a slight update on Sunday evening as she shared an image which read: “A Sunday well spent brings a week of content.” 
Her followers immediately began to speculate whether her happy mood came because she had been spending time with her newborn son and his father. 
Just the day before, Jeremy shared his joy and happiness after spending days in Liverpool with Steph and their one-month-old son. Stephanie Davis and Jeremy McConnell looking happy with their baby in a park Related stories WHAT A CUTIE Stephanie Davis shares picture of Caben-Albi hours after it emerges that she is reunited with Jeremy McConnell HAPPY FAMILIES Stephanie Davis and Jeremy McConnell pictured back together for the first time with newborn baby son Caben-Albi after 10-month feud 'SUNDAY WELL SPENT' Stephanie Davis is feeling 'content' after spending time with ex Jeremy McConnell and son Caben 'FEELING BLESSED' Jeremy McConnell tweets he's had an 'amazing few days' with Stephanie Davis and son Caben DON'T GET BACK WITH HIM Stephanie Davis' concerned pals urge reality star not to reconcile with Jeremy McConnell 
Jeremy - who met Steph while starring on Celebrity Big Brother in January 2016 - took to Twitter to express his happiness late on Friday night. 
"Had an amazing few days, feeling blessed," the reality star wrote along with a heart emoji. 
Jez's update comes the day after it was revealed he had spent at least five days in Liverpool after rushing to be by ex-girlfriend Stephanie Davis’s side this weekend. Twitter
